subject.topic: Louisiana State Seminary of Learning and Military Academy

mods.abstract: William Bringhurst was one of the first cadets to enter the Louisiana State Seminary of Learning and Military Academy. On front- For Mrs. Boyd. On back- Student - Rapides. Picture taken after the war.
